body_html:
Actually, I'm going to try out implementing all the token stuff as a pass. I think it'll be easier to extend that way—people writing operators will only need to mark whether or not it's mutating and the compiler will do the right thing.

Closing for now; will reopen when I'm done with the new version.

body:
Actually, I'm going to try out implementing all the token stuff as a pass. I think it'll be easier to extend that way—people writing operators will only need to mark whether or not it's mutating and the compiler will do the right thing.

Closing for now; will reopen when I'm done with the new version.
